title: Reactive Oxygen Species on Indoor Surfaces
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00031E, Paper
Zhenduo Yao, Glenn Morrison
Reactive Oxygen Species (ROS) are relatively unstable oxygen-containing radicals or non-radicals, some of which may react with tissues and biomolecules after entering the body. ROS is present in indoor aerosols,...
